tool.name: bcftools @EXECUTABLE@
tool.description: Parses VCF or BCF and produces stats which can be plotted using plot-vcfstats

param.name: first_allele_only
param.label: 1St Allele Only
param.help: Include only 1st allele at multiallelic sites

param.name: split_by_ID
param.label: Split By Id (Ignored on multiple inputs)
param.help: Collect stats for sites with ID separately (known vs novel)

param.name: user_tstv
param.label: User Tstv
param.help: Collect Ts/Tv stats for any tag using the given binning: TAG[:min:max:binsize]

validator.message: comma-separated list of floats of increasing value

param.name: af_bins_file
param.label: file listing the allele frequency bins one per line

param.name: af_tag
param.label: allele frequency tag to use, by default estimated from AN,AC or GT

param.name: verbose
param.label: Verbose
param.help: Produce verbose per-site and per-sample output

param.name: plot_title
param.label: Create a plots pdf with this title
